panels.description: Total amount of validators that are currently validating the network for the protocol

targets.rawSql:
WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ActivatedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'activatedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ExitedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'exitedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

panels.title: Effective validators

panels.description: Total amount of validators that were volontarely exited

targets.rawSql:
WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ExitedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'exitedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

panels.title: Unstaked validators

panels.description: Amount of validators being pending activation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*)
FROM 
  event as e
JOIN 
  event_parameter as ep 
ON 
  e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE 
  e.address = '${deposit:raw}' 
  AND e."eventName" = 'DepositEvent'
  AND ep.name = 'withdrawal_credentials'
  AND ep.value = '0x010000000000000000000000aed7cd8d3105f4d6b4ddf99f619dcb2a26d0a900';

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ActivatedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'activatedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

panels.title: Pending activation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT to_value) AS distinct_to_value_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'to' THEN ep.value END) AS to_value
    FROM event e 
    JOIN event_parameter ep ON e.id = ep."eventId"
    WHERE e.address = '${slyx:raw}' 
        AND e."eventName" = 'Transfer'
        AND e.id IN (
            SELECT "eventId" 
            FROM event_parameter 
            WHERE name = 'from' 
            AND value = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
        )
    GROUP BY  e.id, e."blockNumber", e.date, e."transactionHash"
) AS subquery;

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ActivatedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'activatedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ExitedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'exitedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ActivatedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'activatedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

WITH result AS (
  SELECT event_parameter.value 
  FROM event 
  INNER JOIN event_parameter ON event_parameter."eventId" = event.id 
  WHERE "eventName" = 'ExitedValidatorsUpdated'
        AND event.address = '${pool:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name = 'exitedValidators'
  ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT value FROM result),
  '0'
) AS value;

panels.description: Total amount of LYX pending to be unstaked from the protocol

targets.rawSql:
SELECT event_parameter.value FROM event INNER JOIN event_parameter 
ON event_parameter."eventId"=event.id 
WHERE "eventName"='RewardsUpdated'
       AND event.address='${rewards:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name='totalRewards'
ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Total rewards

panels.description: Total amount of LYX pending to be unstaked from the protocol

targets.rawSql:
SELECT event_parameter.value FROM event INNER JOIN event_parameter 
ON event_parameter."eventId"=event.id 
WHERE ("eventName"='UnstakeProcessed' OR "eventName"='UnstakeMatched' 
       OR "eventName"='NewUnstakeRequest') 
       AND event.address='${slyx:raw}'
        AND event_parameter.name='newTotalPendingUnstake'
ORDER BY event."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Pending unstake

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    e."blockNumber",
    e.date,
    e."transactionHash",
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'pubkey' THEN ep.value END) AS pubkey_value
FROM event e 
JOIN event_parameter ep ON e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE e.address = '${deposit:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'DepositEvent'
    AND e.id IN (
        SELECT "eventId" 
        FROM event_parameter 
        WHERE name = 'withdrawal_credentials' 
        AND value = '0x010000000000000000000000aed7cd8d3105f4d6b4ddf99f619dcb2a26d0a900'
    )
GROUP BY  e.id, e."blockNumber", e.date, e."transactionHash"
ORDER BY e."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT 
  Date(e.date) as event_date,
  COUNT(*) as "Number of validators"
FROM 
  event as e
JOIN 
  event_parameter as ep 
ON 
  e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE 
  e.address = '${deposit:raw}' 
  AND e."eventName" = 'DepositEvent'
  AND ep.name = 'withdrawal_credentials'
  AND ep.value = '0x010000000000000000000000e7f1725e7734ce288f8367e1bb143e90bb3f0512'
GROUP BY 
  event_date
ORDER BY 
  event_date;

SELECT 
    e.date,
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'validatorsToExit' THEN ep.value END) AS "Validators to exit"
FROM event e 
JOIN event_parameter ep ON e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE e.address = '${slyx:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'UnstakeReady'
GROUP BY  e.id, e."blockNumber", e.date, e."transactionHash"
ORDER BY e."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT 
  DATE(e.date) as event_date,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE(e.date)) as "Number of validators"
FROM 
  event as e
JOIN 
  event_parameter as ep 
ON 
  e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE 
  e.address = '${deposit:raw}' 
  AND e."eventName" = 'DepositEvent'
  AND ep.name = 'withdrawal_credentials'
  AND ep.value = '0x010000000000000000000000aed7cd8d3105f4d6b4ddf99f619dcb2a26d0a900'
GROUP BY 
  event_date
ORDER BY 
  event_date;

SELECT 
  Date(e.date) as event_date,
  ep.value as "Exited validators"
FROM 
  event as e
JOIN 
  event_parameter as ep 
ON 
  e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE 
  e.address = '${pool:raw}'
  AND e."eventName" = 'ExitedValidatorsUpdated'
  AND ep.name = 'exitedValidators'
GROUP BY 
  event_date, ep.value
ORDER BY 
  event_date;

SELECT 
    COUNT(e.id) AS "Rewards Submitted",
    e.date
FROM event e
WHERE e.address = '${oracles:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'RewardsVoteSubmitted'
    GROUP BY e.date;

SELECT 
    COUNT(e.id) AS "Merkle Submitted",
    e.date
FROM event e
WHERE e.address = '${oracles:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'MerkleRootVoteSubmitted'
    GROUP BY e.date;

SELECT 
    COUNT(e.id) AS "Validators registered",
    e.date
FROM event e
WHERE e.address = '${oracles:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'RegisterValidatorsVoteSubmitted'
    GROUP BY e.date;

SELECT 
    COUNT(e.id) AS "Unstake processing",
    e.date
FROM event e
WHERE e.address = '${oracles:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'UnstakeProcessingVoteSubmitted'
    GROUP BY e.date;

SELECT 
    e."blockNumber",
    e.date,
    e."transactionHash",
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'requestIndex' THEN ep.value END) AS index,
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'account' THEN ep.value END) AS account,
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'amount' THEN ep.value END) AS amount
FROM event e 
JOIN event_parameter ep ON e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE e.address = '${slyx:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'NewUnstakeRequest'
GROUP BY  e.id, e."blockNumber", e.date, e."transactionHash"
ORDER BY e."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT 
    e."blockNumber",
    e.date,
    e."transactionHash",
    MAX(CASE WHEN ep.name = 'validatorsToExit' THEN ep.value END) AS "Validators to exit"
FROM event e 
JOIN event_parameter ep ON e.id = ep."eventId"
WHERE e.address = '${slyx:raw}' 
    AND e."eventName" = 'UnstakeReady'
GROUP BY  e.id, e."blockNumber", e.date, e."transactionHash"
ORDER BY e."blockNumber" DESC
LIMIT 20;
